title: Skribas

fields.name: Last Will (Charge X%):
fields.value: Target a player. You will grant them a last will of a certain character length. The charge for this ability is stored cumulatively across all Evening phases, and you spend 1% from this charge for each 4 characters of a will that you grant.

fields.name: Public Service Announcement (x1, Charge 100%):
fields.value: During any phase, make a public announcement of up to 500 characters in length. This ability is processed instantly and does not use up your action if used during the Night.

fields.name: The Last Word (Passive):
fields.value: You may keep a will of a maximum 500 characters in length.
